Articles.Content: I was wondering if deployed science can break. I am crashing an unused engine stage into the Mun and decided to have it crash next to the deployed science to gather some data. But just in case I missed the target, I was wondering.

Hmmm...

I just cheated a control station 2000m above the surface of Tylo, and it did explode upon impact. So I I guess that crashing a discarded rocket stage into them will also break the deployed science parts. (Assuming that happens within the physics bubble.)  On the other hand: if my aim was that good, then I wouldn't mind to deploy another (set of) part(s).
